column1: Uchi////my friend stacey gave me a good tip bonus for helping her and we celebrated with my husband here and why do peeople eat raw fish!!! u could get sik eating this! its not nature! but he made me and it tasted okay. i like the white wine they gave us they said dis is called suckahe why you going call whine suckah!!? haha silly chines pople. i luv this place tho. my new friend chinese restaurant
